definitionGroups.group: (Canada, South Africa, US, West Midlands, colloquial, informal) Mother.

entries.meaning: (by extension) used as a term of address for one's wife
(informal) An adult female owner of a pet.

verbs.description: mom (third-person singular simple present moms, present participle momming, simple past and past participle mommed)

entries.meaning: (transitive, Canada, US, informal) To care for in a motherly way.
examples: The shock of my news had worn off, and now she'd want to know where I was, how I was doing, and she'd sniff out that I was with someone. “I just wanted to check in on you.” That was Mom. Totally unashamed about momming me.
